original: Nasukhasahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

original: Nanasukhasahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanasukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: ▁nan asukh a saha gat aṃ ▁dhammaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁nan asukh a sahagato ▁dhammo ▁uppajjati ▁hetupaccayā ▁tīṇi

original: Nasukhasahagatañca nanasukhasahagatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: ▁na sukh a saha gat añca ▁nan asukh a saha gat añca ▁dhammaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁na sukh a sahagato ▁dhammo ▁uppajjati ▁hetupaccayā ▁tīṇi ▁saṃkhittaṃ

original: Hetuyā nava …pe… purejāte āsevane cha …pe… avigate nava.
